Contributor: Dimmi, Harvey, artist.; Latham Litho & Ptg. Co., lithographer, printer.; United States Food Administration, publisher.;
Note: Signed "Harvey Dimmi"(?) "No. 11" appears on the bottom left of the poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that victory is a matter of stamina so send wheat, meat, sugar and fats to the servicemen. Illustration shows two men on the battlefield.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
Subject: Food conservation -- United States.; Labor productivity -- United States.; World War, 1914-1918 -- Propaganda.; War posters, American.;

Title: Victory is a question of stamina
